content.question: Which of the following areas shows the producer surplus and the deadweight loss?

choices.label: The producer surplus is area <math alttext="P sub 1, end sub, B, C, P sub 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mtext>P</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow></msub><msub><mrow><mtext>BCP</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>0</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math>, and the deadweight loss is area <math alttext="B, J, E" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>BJE</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>.

The producer surplus is area <math alttext="P sub 1, end sub, B, J, F" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mtext>P</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow></msub><mtext>BJF</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>, and the deadweight loss is area <math alttext="B, J, E" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>BJE</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>.

The producer surplus is area <math alttext="P sub 1, end sub, B, Q sub 1, end sub, 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mtext>P</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow></msub><mtext>B</mtext><msub><mrow><mtext>Q</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow></msub><mn>0</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>, and the deadweight loss is area <math alttext="B, J, E" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>BJE</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>.

The producer surplus is area <math alttext="P sub 1, end sub, B, Q sub 1, end sub, 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mtext>P</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow></msub><mtext>B</mtext><msub><mrow><mtext>Q</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow></msub><mn>0</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>, and the deadweight loss is area <math alttext="B, C, E" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>BCE</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>.

The producer surplus is area <math alttext="P sub 0, end sub, E, A" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mtext>P</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>0</mn></mrow></msub><mtext>EA</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>, and the deadweight loss is area <math alttext="C, E, J" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>CEJ</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>.

content.answer: The producer surplus is area <math alttext="P sub 1, end sub, B, J, F" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mtext>P</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow></msub><mtext>BJF</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>, and the deadweight loss is area <math alttext="B, J, E" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>BJE</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>.

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Using economic concepts, principles, or models, explain how a specific economic outcome occurs, or what action should be taken in order to achieve a specific economic outcome.
